test_scenarios.name: New User Registration - Successful Account Creation
steps: Click on 'Sign Up' or similar call to action.
Complete the initial onboarding questionnaire (minimal required fields).
Select a plan (if prompted, choose a free or trial option).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Account is created successfully, and user is logged into the Noom application. User is redirected to the main dashboard or a welcome screen.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Daily Food Logging
steps: Navigate to the food logging section (e.g., 'Add Food' or similar).
Search for a common food item (e.g., 'Apple').
Select a matching food entry from the search results.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The food entry is successfully logged for the current day.  The food is displayed in the user's food log.

test_scenarios.name: Record Weight - Successful Weight Submission
steps: Navigate to the weight tracking section.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The weight entry is successfully saved and displayed in the weight tracking graph/history.

test_scenarios.name: Dashboard Progress Visualization - Correct Data Display
steps: Verify the display of weight chart, calorie intake for the day
test_scenarios.expected_result: The dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date information based on previous food logs and weight entries. Weight loss or maintenance is calculated (if applicable) and correctly displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Message a Coach - Successful message delivery
steps: Navigate to the messaging section with the coach (if coach feature is activated).
Type a message in the text field.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The message is sent and appears in the conversation history with the coach.
